result.reason: The 'Quick connect does not save history' issue is due to the OnQuickConnectConnected method not adding the connected item to RecentConnectionsService.
result.approach: Modify frmMain.cs to call RecentConnectionsService.Instance.Add() after a quick connect, using the ConnectionInfo object created by Runtime.ConnectionsService.CreateQuickConnect().
